rows.label: qst711802_msg0001
rows.name:
What is it, mo? You want to review
the contents of the test again, mo?

rows.label: qst711802_msg0002
rows.name:
Good thinking, mo! Thorough
preparation is a must for
a combat pro, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0003
rows.name:
For this test, I want you to perform
the entire sequence of Break,
Topple, Launch, and Smash, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0004
rows.name:
Launch is an attack that sends the enemy
flying, and Smash is an attack that slams
the launched enemy into the ground, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0005
rows.name:
For this test, I want you to
perform this entire Driver
Combo sequence 3 times, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0006
rows.name:
By the way, the location and
target for this Driver Combo
can be anywhere and anyone, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0007
rows.name:
Being able to choose a location and opponent that
maximizes the performance of your own and your
comrades' Arts is also a mark of a combat pro, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0101
rows.name:
As expected of someone Gororo
saw potential in, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0102
rows.name:
You seem to have cleared
the test splendidly, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0103
rows.name:
Even without seeing it directly,
I can tell by your faces, mo.
That's what a combat pro is, mo.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0104
rows.name:
As a reward for clearing the test,
Gororo will give you a little tip
about Driver Combos, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0105
rows.name:
Did you know that some monsters
will topple themselves, mo?

rows.label: qst711802_msg0106
rows.name:
This is often because the monster
can't handle the recoil of a big
move it used, and topples over, mo.

rows.label: qst711802_msg0107
rows.name:
If you can spot that and connect it to a
Launch and Smash Driver Combo, you can gain
an advantage even against strong enemies, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0108
rows.name:
...Now, with this test, you
should have grown significantly
as Drivers, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0109
rows.name:
The final decision will be made after consulting
with Gororo's Blade, but you all are more
than qualified as a fighting force, mo!

rows.label: qst711802_msg0110
rows.name:
Well then, please let me know when
you're ready on your end, mo!
